div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
تذكرة ما خرج من الدّينر ودرهم
في ثمن الجزيف خمسة الدّرهم ونصف
في ثمن ما ذكرا الدّفتر درهم
ر الدّارس درهم
درهم
درهم
درهم
درهم
درهم
درهم وربع

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
taḏkiraẗu mā ḫaraǧa mina ăd dīnāri wa dirham:in
fī ṯamani ăl ǧazīfi ḫamsaẗu ăd dirhami wa niṣf:un
fī ṯamani mā ḏakarā ăd daftaru dirham:un
***r ăd dāris dirham:un
*** dirham:un
*** dirham:un
*** dirham:un
*** dirham:un
*** dirham:un
*** dirham:un wa rubʿ:un

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Memory note of what has been disbursed of dînâr(s) and dirham(s)
for the price of the fishing-net | five dirhams and a half
for the price of that which is mentioned in the account book (?) | one dirham
[...]r, the thrasher [...]r, the thrasher | one dirham
[...] one dirham
[...] one dirham
[...] one dirham
[...] one dirham
[...] one dirham
[...] one dirham and a quarter
